news.title: Shudder to Think Announce First Tour Since 2008
news.summary: The D.C. hardcore veterans will play shows across the United States in October and November

news.title: Paz Lenchantin Announces Debut Solo Album, Shares Video for New Song “Hang Tough”: Watch
news.summary: The Pixies alum will release Triste on October 17 via her own imprint, Hideous Human Records
